department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Elisa commercial kit for serodiagnosis of porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus. Award up to 2 Standing Offers.
description: Awarding contracts for prequalification of Elisa kits for PRRSV.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Request for Proposal**
==========================================================

**Tender Title**
---------------

39903-240103 Elisa Commercial Kit for CFIA - RFP

**Solicitation Number**
---------------------

WS4063661066

**Reference Number**
------------------

WS4063661066-Doc4063714672

**Publication Date**
-----------------

October 16, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

November 15, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Description**
--------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites bids for an Elisa Commercial Kit qualification process for serodiagnosis of Portcine Reproductive and Respiratory Syndrome Virus (PRRSV). The primary objective is to award contracts for the prequalification of ELISA commercial kits for the detection of antibodies for the serodiagnosis of PRRSV.

**Notice Type**
-------------

Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method**
-------------------

Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Canada

**Contact Information**
-------------------
